A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very enjoyable\, different take on the Skywalker saga. I don't know what the 'fans' are talking about. Yes there are some odd bits in the film\, some jokes that don't really land\, but this doesn't take away from it being a great film. It's is beautifully made\, with some great acting\, and while Leia's force pull through space is a bit naff\, I really enjoyed the subversion of our expectations for these characters we think we know.
